page.title: 15MEDIA - RADIO, NEWSPAPERS
page.content:
{Radio}is a way of being kept amused.There are different channels on the radio.There are three{local {stations}called Radio Leicester, Radio Derby and Radio Nottingham.
{Daily Papers. In Newbold there are 254 houses.Out of that 35% have daily papers.
Financial Times 1%. The Mirror 19%. The Telegraph 5%.The Express 17%. The Mail 16%.The Star 4%. The Sun 32%.The Guardian 1%.
We also have{local papers. The Coalville Times taken by 87% of village. The Ashby Times by 5%. The Loughborough Echo by 6%.
